title: Eames Style Office Chair EA117 Mesh
body: This classic office chair is designed back in 1950 and since then, the chair has become widely popular all over the world and has been used in various movies and television series. The Eames Office Chair EA117 Mesh is the ideal chair to have if you aim to make your office look significant as it is suited for a long day’s workload. With its medium-high backseat, it is perfect for a table-oriented sitting position.
